name: Pitch Black
description: Permanent Curse of Darkness. Navigate in near-total darkness.

name: High Brow
description: Start with a poop-themed loadout. Number One + E. Coli + Butt Bombs.

name: Head Trauma
description: Start with Small Rock, Soy Milk, Tiny Planet, and Curved Horn. Tears orbit around you with very high fire rate but low damage.

name: Darkness Falls
description: Play as Eve with extra devil items. Start with Pentagram, Dead Bird, and Dark Matter.

name: The Tank
description: Very slow but tanky. Magdalene with lots of health and Thunder Thighs.

name: Solar System
description: Orbital-only run. No tears; rely entirely on orbitals for damage.

name: Suicide King
description: Start with Mr. Mega, Ipecac, and My Reflection. Explosive tears boomerang back toward you. Extremely dangerous — avoid your own shots.

name: Cat Got Your Tongue
description: Guppy transformation from the start. Blindfolded — flies do the damage.

name: Demo Man
description: Start with Dr. Fetus and Remote Detonator. All tears are bombs you control.

name: Cursed!
description: Permanent Curse of the Labyrinth — every floor is an XL floor.

name: Glass Cannon
description: Start with Epic Fetus and low health. One-hit potential but extremely fragile.

name: When Life Gives You Lemons
description: Start with Lemon Mishap, 9 Volt, and Habit. Lemon-themed run.

name: Beans!
description: Bean-themed run. Start with The Bean, 9 Volt, and Butt Bombs.

name: It's in the Cards
description: Start with a deck of cards and Starter Deck. Use cards to survive.

name: Slow Roll
description: Start with Polyphemus + My Reflection + Cupid's Arrow. Huge slow tears.

name: Computer Savvy
description: Start with Technology + Spoon Bender + Technology 2. Laser loadout.

name: Waka Waka
description: Start with Strange Attractor + Anti-Gravity. Tears pull enemies.

name: The Host
description: Start with Mulligan + Spider Bite. Blindfolded — familiars fight for you.

name: The Family Man
description: Blindfolded. Start with Brother Bobby, Sister Maggy, Dad's Key, Rotten Baby, and Multidimensional Baby. Familiars do all the damage.

name: Purist
description: No item rooms spawn at all. You only get boss items and any pickups you find. Pure skill and resource management.

name: XXXXXXXXL
description: Every floor is an XXL floor. Massive floors to explore.

name: SPEED!
description: A timer ticks down. When it reaches zero, you take a full heart of damage every second until you reach the next floor. Clear rooms fast and rush to the boss. Start with Speed Ball.
restrictions: Full heart damage when timer expires

name: Blue Bomber
description: Play as ??? with Kamikaze! and Pyromaniac. Bomb yourself to heal.

name: PAY TO PLAY
description: All doors cost money. No coins means no progress.

name: Have a Heart
description: Cannot gain Red Heart containers. Soul hearts and black hearts only.

name: I RULE!
description: Start with Mega Blast, Blank Card, and Jera. Overpowered from the start.

name: BRAINS!
description: Blindfolded with Bob's Brain and Thunder Thighs. Brain does all damage.

name: PRIDE DAY!
description: Start with Rainbow Baby and 3 random passive items. No treasure rooms.

name: Onan's Streak
description: Every tear that hits the ground or a wall without hitting an enemy damages you for a full heart. Start with 20/20 and Chocolate Milk. Aim carefully.
restrictions: Missed tear = 1 full heart of damage

name: The Guardian
description: Blindfolded. Protect a mobile heart that follows you. Punching Bag fights.

name: Backasswards
description: Start in the Dark Room with powerful items. Each floor you descend backwards, one item is removed. By Basement I you have almost nothing. Must survive increasingly weak.

name: Aprils Fool
description: All items, pickups, enemies, and bosses are visually swapped. Nothing is what it looks like.

name: Pokey Mans
description: Blindfolded. Start with Friendly Ball. Capture enemies and throw them to fight.

name: Ultra Hard
description: No hearts drop at all. All curses active on every floor. All enemies are champions. Must reach and defeat Mega Satan. Widely considered the hardest challenge in the game. Tip: use Sacrifice Rooms and Blood Donation Machines for angel items.
restrictions: No heart drops of any kind

name: Pong
description: Blindfolded. Start with Pong-like orbitals that bounce around.

name: Scat Man
description: Start with Skatole and poop items. Fly-themed run.

name: Bloody Mary
description: Start as Magdalene with Blood Bag, Anemic, and Blood Oath.

name: Baptism by Fire
description: Play as Lazarus with fire-themed items.

name: Isaac's Awakening
description: Play as Isaac with flight-themed items. Tooth and Nail + Aries.

name: Seeing Double
description: Play as Jacob & Esau. Every room spawns double the normal enemies. Both characters share damage — if one dies, you lose. Must reach Mother through the alt path.

name: Pica Run
description: Start with Marbles and A Snack. Trinket-eating run.

name: Hot Potato
description: Blindfolded. Carry a live bomb that you must toss at enemies.

name: Cantripped
description: Start with Bag of Crafting (like Tainted Cain). Craft items from pickups.

name: Red Redemption
description: Play as Tainted Magdalene through the alt path. Hugging enemies for health.

name: DELETE THIS
description: Play as Tainted Apollyon with Eraser and Void. Erase enemy types permanently from the run. Void absorbs items for stat ups.
